Name: Elementary Anatomy: With Story Mode
About the game: Human Anatomy VR Do you know how many bones are in the human body? Explore your body down to the smallest detail. Up to 7,000 precisely modelled anatomy structures in your VR device. Amazing graphics and intuitive control allows you to explore the human anatomy from a whole new point of view. A unique function – AntMode – makes you 40 times smaller in order to explore inner body structures in a greater detail. Can you rebuild the human body? Do you know where is the Humerus located? Get to know the whole human body in an enjoyable way thanks to the Human Anatomy VR. Human Anatomy VR is an educational application in virtual reality. The application depicts simplified anatomy models suitable for high school students. Human Anatomy VR offers unique virtual and educational experience. Human Anatomy VR employs all advantages of virtual reality in order to make learning more entertaining and effective. The Human Anatomy VR contains all anatomy systems. And lot of amazing functions.
